title: CafePress Appalachian Trail White Blaze Long Long Sleeve T
features: COZY YET STYLISH COMFORT: Our men's long-sleeve T-shirt delivers everyday comfort with a little added warmth. Wear it alone or layer it up!

AN EVERYDAY ESSENTIAL: Our long-sleeve crewneck T-shirts are where casual comfort meets self-expression. No need to sacrifice style when temperatures drop! Made of 6.1 oz. 100% pre-shrunk ring-spun cotton, our long-sleeve tees feature ribbed sleeve cuffs and a flattering cut. Size up for a looser fit.
PROFESSIONALLY PRINTED: Expertly printed with vivid designs, our tees are designed to show off your personality, passions, and humor. Imported for final manufacture locally.

MADE TO LAST: Our graphic T-shirts will make a statement everywhere you go. Easily machine washes cold with like colors, inside/out, then tumble dry low. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Choose from several colors, sizes S - 3XL available.

IDEAL FOR YOURSELF & A UNIQUE GIFT: Surprise your husband, brother, dad, grandpa, son, uncle, or friend, or order one just for you! Our classic T-shirts make a unique and thoughtful gift for Christmas, Father's Day, and birthdays, or just because!
description: Men's crewneck, long sleeve t-shirt. Features the comfort and style of a classic tee. Choose from thousands of creative, funny, and meaningful designs. 99% Cotton and 1% Polyester. Machine wash in cold and tumble dry low.
